trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Hippothoe wishes to conduct another test of the ailouroi's capacity─and yours.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_TODO_00<tab>Speak with researchers at the Twelve Wonders.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Hippothoe.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_000<tab>I am so pleased that you're willing to join us in further research.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_001<tab>Thus far, you have noted this ailouros's response to stimuli.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_002<tab>However, the ailouroi have one more <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> special capability. Aren't you curious?

TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_003<tab>You will be pleased to know that I have dispatched one additional ailouros to fly about the Twelve Wonders, then. If she is working as designed, the phenomenon should be clearly observable.

TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_004<tab>I expect that you will be able to collect evidence of it from my fellow researchers...say, Oloros, Deukalion, and Chloris? Do present your conclusions to me when you've finished!
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_GEALCAT04289_000_007<tab>Mrrrp!
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_010<tab>What fun would it be if I told you in advance? Better that you reach your own conclusions.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_OLOROS_000_020<tab>Isn't this the most darling familiar you have ever seen?
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_OLOROS_000_021<tab>Behold its soft and fluffy fur, its pudgy belly, its charming little bell! Its eyes that gaze imploringly into the very depths of your soul!
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_OLOROS_000_022<tab>It makes you want to dismantle it and gobble its adorable aether right up, does it not?

TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_OLOROS_000_023<tab>I dare not, of course─whoever it belongs to would be quite cross indeed. Yet even to gaze upon it stokes within me a creative passion the likes of which I've never known!
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_GEALCAT04289_000_024<tab>(-Ailouros-)M-Meeew...
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_OLOROS_000_025<tab>Alas, my muse! Perhaps I need create my own familiar of surpassing cuteness after all...
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_DEUKALION_000_030<tab>A tiny winged creature? Do you refer to Hippothoe's familiar, perchance? I did see it not long ago.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_DEUKALION_000_031<tab>I know not where it's gone off to, I regret to say. I would assist in your search, but I must put brush to parchment before I forget what I meant to write.

TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_DEUKALION_000_032<tab>Outside of my observational duties, I have been laboring over a treatise on aquatic flora, you see. Yet rereading my work a moment ago, I was suddenly struck with how trite my conclusion sounds.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_DEUKALION_000_033<tab>I believe I know precisely how to strengthen it, however. I daresay even Halmarut shall be impressed by my insight!

TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_CHLORIS_000_040<tab>I would advise you to keep your head down─I saw some manner of creature darting about in the air just now. If it carries on like that, it's only a matter of time before it collides with someone's skull.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_CHLORIS_000_041<tab>It startled me so badly that I accidentally created a winged fish─of all things!─which itself escaped to the skies ere I knew it...

TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_CHLORIS_000_042<tab>Though, now that I have a moment to reflect on its speedy departure, perhaps the ability to fly is not so wasted upon aquatic creatures as I believed. Surely such a boon would give them heretofore unknown capacity to evade predation...

TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_CHLORIS_000_043<tab>The recent fashion for flying concepts may have something to it after all. I really must pay visit to the Bureau of the Architect next I'm in Amaurot─I doubt anyone has registered a <var 1A 02 /var>winged fish<var 1A 01 /var> yet.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_OLOROS_000_050<tab>Soft fur...wide eyes... Hmm, what else should I add?
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_DEUKALION_000_055<tab>Halmarut may even appoint me to a research position at the Akadaemia Anyder... At last, my time has arrived!

TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_CHLORIS_000_060<tab>We were fortunate that it was a <var 1A 02 /var>happy<var 1A 01 /var> accident this time, of course. You know how it is─someone yells, “surprise!” and suddenly you've created a stunted serpent with yellow stripes or some nonsense. We can't have that.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_GEALCAT04289_000_065<tab>Mew, mew!
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_070<tab>I see you have spoken to everyone. And what are your findings?
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_071<tab>Exactly right! The ailouroi bless those they meet with inspiration.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_072<tab>After all, we are at our best─and our brightest─when our hearts are at ease. With clarity of thought and faith in ourselves, we can do anything.
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_073<tab>And what could possibly quell inner turmoil so well as a lovable creature like this?
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_GEALCAT04289_000_074<tab>Mew, mew! Mrowr...
TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_075<tab>Ah, it seems duty calls─she senses another irregularity. Off you go then, dear girl!

TEXT_AKTKZG014_04289_HIPPOTHOE_000_076<tab>With today's results, the ailouros concept will be approved in no time. I am truly fortunate to have such wonderful familiars to work with─yourself included, of course!
